select.id: get被保険者資格不整合一覧

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rgdb."DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha" AS DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha WHERE NOT( (DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."kaijoYMD" IS NULL OR DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."kaijoYMD"='' AND (#{nyushoTsuchiHakkoYMD} >DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."tekiyoYMD" AND #{nyushoTsuchiHakkoYMD} >='99991231') OR (#{taishoTsuchiHakkoYMD}<=DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."tekiyoYMD" AND #{taishoTsuchiHakkoYMD}<'99991231') ) OR (DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."kaijoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."kaijoYMD"!='' AND (#{nyushoTsuchiHakkoYMD} > DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."tekiyoYMD" AND #{nyushoTsuchiHakkoYMD} >= DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."kaijoYMD") OR (#{taishoTsuchiHakkoYMD} <= DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."tekiyoYMD" AND #{taishoTsuchiHakkoYMD} < DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha."kaijoYMD") ))
